executable.title: BRAINSLandmarkInitializer
executable.description: Create transformation file (*.h5) from a pair of landmarks (*fcsv) files.
executable.contributor: Eunyoung Regina Kim, Ali Ghayoor, and Hans J. Johnson

file.name: inputWeightFilename
file.label: weight file name
file.description: Input weight file name for landmarks. Higher weighted landmark will be considered more heavily. Weights are propotional, that is the magnitude of weights will be normalized by its minimum and maximum value.

transform.name: outputTransformFilename
transform.label: output Transform file name
transform.description: output transform file name (ex: ./moving2fixed.h5) that is appropriate for applying to the moving image to align with the fixed image. The _Inverse file is also written that is approporate for placing the moving Landmarks with the fixed image.

image.name: inputReferenceImageFilename
image.label: Reference image
image.description: Set the reference image to define the parametric domain for the BSpline transform.

integer.name: bsplineNumberOfControlPoints
integer.label: Number of control points for the BSpline transform
integer.description: Set the number of control points to define the parametric domain for the BSpline transform.
